019package com.plotsquared.core.command;
020
021import com.plotsquared.core.configuration.caption.TranslatableCaption;
022import com.plotsquared.core.permissions.Permission;
023import com.plotsquared.core.player.PlotPlayer;
024import com.plotsquared.core.plot.Plot;
025import com.plotsquared.core.plot.flag.PlotFlag;
026import com.plotsquared.core.plot.flag.implementations.AnimalCapFlag;
027import com.plotsquared.core.plot.flag.implementations.EntityCapFlag;
028import com.plotsquared.core.plot.flag.implementations.HostileCapFlag;
029import com.plotsquared.core.plot.flag.implementations.MiscCapFlag;
030import com.plotsquared.core.plot.flag.implementations.MobCapFlag;
031import com.plotsquared.core.plot.flag.implementations.VehicleCapFlag;
032import com.plotsquared.core.util.Permissions;
033import net.kyori.adventure.text.Component;
034import net.kyori.adventure.text.ComponentLike;
035import net.kyori.adventure.text.minimessage.tag.Tag;
036import net.kyori.adventure.text.minimessage.tag.resolver.TagResolver;
037
038import static com.plotsquared.core.util.entity.EntityCategories.CAP_ANIMAL;
039import static com.plotsquared.core.util.entity.EntityCategories.CAP_ENTITY;
040import static com.plotsquared.core.util.entity.EntityCategories.CAP_MISC;
041import static com.plotsquared.core.util.entity.EntityCategories.CAP_MOB;
042import static com.plotsquared.core.util.entity.EntityCategories.CAP_MONSTER;
043import static com.plotsquared.core.util.entity.EntityCategories.CAP_VEHICLE;
044
045@CommandDeclaration(command = "caps",
046        category = CommandCategory.INFO,
047        usage = "/plot caps")
048public class Caps extends SubCommand {
049
050    @Override
051    public boolean onCommand(final PlotPlayer<?> player, final String[] args) {
052        final Plot plot = player.getCurrentPlot();
053        if (plot == null) {
054            player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("errors.not_in_plot"));
055            return false;
056        }
057        if (!plot.isAdded(player.getUUID()) && !Permissions
058                .hasPermission(player, Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_CAPS_OTHER)) {
059            player.sendMessage(
060                    TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission"),
061                    TagResolver.resolver("node", Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_CAPS_OTHER))
062            );
063            return false;
064        }
065        if (plot.getVolume() > Integer.MAX_VALUE) {
066            player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("schematics.schematic_too_large"));
067            return false;
068        }
069        player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("info.plot_caps_header"));
070        final int[] countedEntities = plot.countEntities();
071        sendFormatted(plot, player, MobCapFlag.class, countedEntities, "mobs", CAP_MOB);
072        sendFormatted(plot, player, HostileCapFlag.class, countedEntities, "hostile", CAP_MONSTER);
073        sendFormatted(plot, player, AnimalCapFlag.class, countedEntities, "animals", CAP_ANIMAL);
074        sendFormatted(plot, player, VehicleCapFlag.class, countedEntities, "vehicle", CAP_VEHICLE);
075        sendFormatted(plot, player, MiscCapFlag.class, countedEntities, "misc", CAP_MISC);
076        sendFormatted(plot, player, EntityCapFlag.class, countedEntities, "entities", CAP_ENTITY);
077        return true;
078    }
079
080    private <T extends PlotFlag<Integer, T>> void sendFormatted(
081            final Plot plot,
082            final PlotPlayer<?> player, final Class<T> capFlag, final int[] countedEntities,
083            final String name, final int type
084    ) {
085        final int current = countedEntities[type];
086        final int max = plot.getFlag(capFlag);
087        final String percentage = String.format("%.1f", 100 * ((float) current / max));
088        ComponentLike maxBeautified = max >= Integer.MAX_VALUE
089                ? TranslatableCaption.of("info.infinite").toComponent(player)
090                : Component.text(max);
091        player.sendMessage(
092                TranslatableCaption.of("info.plot_caps_format"),
093                TagResolver.builder()
094                        .tag("cap", Tag.inserting(Component.text(name)))
095                        .tag("current", Tag.inserting(Component.text(current)))
096                        .tag("limit", Tag.inserting(maxBeautified))
097                        .tag("percentage", Tag.inserting(Component.text(percentage)))
098                        .build()
099        );
100    }
101
102}
